name: steamwebintegration
description: Integrate your personal Steam information on the web, at your convenience!

scripts.build: mkdir build && cp manifest.json build/manifest.json && cp LICENSE build/LICENSE && cp -r --parents images build && cp -r --parents popup build && cp -r --parents scripts build
scripts.build:xpi: npm run build:firefox && npm run build && (cd build && zip -r ../bin/steamwebintegration.xpi .) && npm run build:clear
scripts.build:crx: npm run build:chromium && npm run build && crx pack build -o bin/steamwebintegration.crx -p bin/steamwebintegration.pem && npm run build:clear
scripts.build:all: npm run build:crx && npm run build:xpi

author: Revadike
